##OZARK

## Question 1: A brief description of the show (use _italics_ for names).

After a money laundering scheme for a _Mexican_ drug cartel goes wrong, financial advisor _Marty Byrde_ proposes to make amends by offering to set up a bigger laundering operation in the Lake of the _Ozarks_ region of central _Missouri_. _Marty_ suddenly moves his family from the _Chicago_ suburb of _Naperville_ to the remote summer resort community of _Osage Beach, Missouri_. When the Byrdes arrive in _Missouri_, they become entangled with local criminals, including the _Langmore_ and _Snell_ families, and later the _Kansas City Mafia_
